item.description:
April Meeting of New England United
Saturday, 11 April, 1-5 pm
Charter Oak Cultural Center, Gallery
21 Charter Oak Ave., Hartford, CT 06106

For directions to the meeting: http://www.charteroak...
For more info: Chris 860 478 5300

Proposed Agenda

1. Opening Presentation

Nada Khader, Palestinian Spokeswoman, Executive Director of WESPAC since 2001
Saeed Ahghari, M.D., recently returned from Gaza where he documented the medical results of the siege

2. Reports on March 21 and April 4 demonstrations.

What is our balance sheet for the spring mobilizations?

3. Reportback on AFSC and One State Conferences.

4. Upcoming deliberative assemblies: July National Assembly Conference, CAN conference, Fall NEU Regional Conference, Other

5. Committee Reports

6. Next Meeting.
item.name: New England United regional antiwar coalition general meeting
